item.title: UT-43 West at UT-44
item.description: UT-43 west at UT-44 in Manila. Use UT-43 west for Mountain View (Wyoming). Use UT-44 South for Vernal and Flaming Gorge Dam.

item.title: UT-43 West at UT-44
item.description: UT-43 west at UT-44 in Manila. Sinclair gasoline dinosaur in foreground of photo.

item.title: US-191 North at UT-44
item.description: US-191 North (Flaming Gorge Uintas Scenic Byway) at UT-44 in Daggett County. Turn right to continue north on US-191.

item.title: US-191 North at UT-44
item.description: US-191 north at UT-44 junction in Daggett County. Turn right to continue on US-191 north to Dutch John and Rock Springs (Wyoming). Continue straight for UT-44 to Manila.

item.title: US-191 North Approaching UT-44
item.description: US-191 North approaching UT-44 in Daggett County.

item.title: UT-44 East Approaching US-191
item.description: UT-44 east approaching US-191. Use US-191 north for Flaming Gorge Dam, Dutch John, and Rock Springs (Wyoming).

item.title: UT-43 East Approaching UT-44
item.description: UT-43 east approaching UT-44. Use UT-44 east for Vernal, Dutch John, and Flaming Gorge Dam. Continue east on UT-43 for Green River.

item.title: UT-43 East Approaching UT-44
item.description: UT-43 east approaching UT-44. UT-44 is a Utah Scenic Byway.

item.title: End UT-44 North at UT-43
item.description: End UT-44 north at UT-43 to Salt Lake and Green River, in Manila.

item.title: End UT44 North at UT-43
item.description: End of UT-44 at UT-43 in Manilla.

item.title: Jct. UT-44 on UT-43 West
item.description: UT-43 west approaching UT-44 in Manilla. UT-44 combined with US-191 is the Utah portion of the Flaming Gorge Loop.

item.title: US-191 North at UT-44
item.description: US-191 north at UT-44 junction in Daggett County, on the southern end of Flaming Gorge NRA.

item.title: UT-43 West at UT-44
item.description: UT-43 west at UT-44 junction in Manilla.

item.title: UT-43 West at UT-44
item.description: UT-43 west at UT-44 junction to Dutch John and Vernal, in Manilla.
